								                    Blastic Phase Chronic Myelogenous Leukemia
								                    Treatment of blastic phase chronic myelogenous leukemia may include the following:         -  Targeted therapy with a tyrosine kinase inhibitor.    -  Chemotherapy using one or more drugs.    -  High-dose chemotherapy.    -  Donor stem cell transplant.    - Chemotherapy as palliative therapy to relieve sym
